issue.title: [C++] Allow CSV Writer to take a RecordBatchReader as input
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Please could we extend the CSV Writer to not only take a Table or RecordBatch as inputs, but also RecordBatchReader?  This would be super-helpful for opening data as a dataset and writing to a single file.
